docs.snippet: The possibility of economic reprisals by Germany was indicated in informal discussions by delegates here today to be a leading factor in South American opposition to all proposals before the Pan-American Conference tending to solidify American...
docs.lead_paragraph: The possibility of economic reprisals by Germany was indicated in informal discussions by delegates here today to be a leading factor in South American opposition to all proposals before the Pan-American Conference tending to solidify American sentiment or action in a manner that could be interpreted as anti-European.
docs.abstract: Chile to present plan for peace move

headline.main: LIMA BLOC FIGHTS 'SOLIDARITY' PLAN; Fear of Economic Reprisal by Germany Draws Five to Argentina's Side CUBA BACKS U. S. DRAFT Insists on Action Even if Hull Drops Project for Sake of Conference Unanimity Hull Reticent on U. S. Draft Cubans Irked by Rebuff

byline.original: By HAROLD B. HINTONSpecial Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The PanAmerican conference today received a recommendation that it adopt the principle that foreign investors in Latin America are not entitled to diplomatic protection except in cases where justice is denied to them by local courts.

docs.snippet: With preliminary ceremonies and organization routine out of the way, the Eighth International Conference of American States finally got down to work this morning. Its interest was keenly centered on the committee studying the organization of peace.

docs.snippet: The United States delegation offered the eighth Pan-American conference today its major contribution toward preservation of peace in this hemisphere. The proposal took the form of a new treaty embodying the principles of eight separate pacts now in...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States delegation offered the eighth Pan-American conference today its major contribution toward preservation of peace in this hemisphere. The proposal took the form of a new treaty embodying the principles of eight separate pacts now in existence.

docs.snippet: Most classes of bonds, except United States Government obligations, extended their broad upward movement yesterday in the heaviest trading on the New York Stock Exchange this year.
